title: Works fine for me
comment: If you cant stream, just download vlc for android form play store to stream

title: Ubisoft-level
comment: Used to work. Can't switch stations.

title: Whyy!!!
comment: Older version worked the best" new updated one is confusing and Don't let you vote or pick request

title: Needs an internal streamer
comment: The app requires an internal streamer before I give it 5☆.  The app however is very decent.
I logged in but tuned in keeps saying im not and the songs that I requested wont play
Hey, if you don't mind, report bugs to https://github.com/OEP/rainwave-android/issues . You can type a much more detailed report there and it helps me figure out where the problem lies.

title: Confusion
comment: Spent half an hour trying to find the "numeric user ID" it prompts for to log in. I registered and searched all over the rainwave.cc website. Somehow I was locked into the "forums" section, probably due to being on the site as an anonymous user to begin with. Clicking on the Rainwave logo at the top left only took me to the top of forums.  Once I re-entered the "rainwave.cc" url by hand, I got to the main screen, where the "Manage API Keys" button is. What a hassle.  Now it finally works.

title: Great app *almost* working
comment: I'm now getting track listings and different stream options, but ServeStream still can't open the URLs.
Looks like a bug with some of the stream servers, I've reported it to the operators. Occasionally it does bounce to one that works; in the meantime hang tight...

title: Awesome
comment: Thank you for this app, and thank you for updating to Rainwave 4.

title: Cool app
comment: Thanks for fixing it, I missed it!

title: Happy thx
comment: Absolutely, one of my most anticipated apps! Thank you. Xoxo

title: Decent but needs updated
comment: No update for some time. Needs to have a no screen rotation option. Crashed a lot on two phones when rotation would happen. There needs to be a way to tune in easier. Too often I come back to vote and I cannot tune in for anything. A great app none the less and highly recommended, but still needs some love.

Working on the screen rotation issue now, though I'm not going to disable it since it's my responsibility to be able to handle it. 
People in general have been having trouble with the streams being down. I reported something I found wrong to the operators. I'm unsure exactly what your problem is though I encourage you to file an issue on GitHub.
Awesome!

title: Huzzah
comment: Great online radio that caters to video game music.

title: Awesome
comment: Great free app for video game music! You can vote for and request songs! Be sure to get xiialive lite in order to use the app and go to http://rainwave.C C/auth to generate your API key!

title: Ok
comment: Does what i want but crashes often

title: Alright but needs work
comment: When it works it works well.  Does not work with default music player, playback disables when trying to interact with program.  Works well with servestream however, but it isn't a seamless pairing and does not always detect you as being tuned in for voting or requesting.

Just to be a little clearer, the default music player is very simple and is not really meant to handle streaming audio, that's why it's recommended you get a player tailored to that purpose. I can't fix the default player unless I start contributing code to Android which I'm sure nobody wants. :)

title: Perfect
comment: A must for any Rainwave fan.

title: xiialite only works
comment: Not even pro version of xiia works with this. Not 2 bad a  restriction

title: Excellent
comment: It works great with ServeStream. I haven't encountered any problems.

title: Good
comment: I recommend ServeStream too.

title: Great app, poor directions
comment: For anyone wanting to use this app, you NEED Xiialive lite to stream it correctly. The default android will automatically close when minimized which doesn't allow you do even use the rain wave app to vote or request songs. This is all solved when using xiialive lite as the player. I have no idea why the developer doesn't make any mention of this in the app description.  tl;dr download xiialite live with rainwave
A must have for OCRemix fans. People who stream Rainwave on PC will welcome this app.

title: Disappointing
comment: Does not accept key if key is typed in using QWERTY keyboard.  Quits streaming if switching between other apps.

Not sure what this issue was about. I used to have something which ensures you only type hexadecimal characters into the key field, but the keys have changed to not being hexadecimal-only, so I removed that completely.

Also, I'll echo here that you should not use the default music player with this app, but something like ServeStream.

title: Perfection
comment: The perfect mobile app to an even more perfect music streaming site

title: Perfect
comment: Exactly what I was looking for! I never rate apps but I just had to give it 5 stars.

title: Very nice
comment: I'd really like a widget to go along with this, just to stop/play  and display the album art. I use winamp to play in the background.
